title: Geyser
summaries: The Geyser is a trap that spews a vertical stream of fire which deals a base damage of 40 / 80 / 120 and a knockback of 2 (Very weak). Geysers are found naturally-placed in random areas that are deep enough to generate lava, including the Underworld and deeper Cavern areas.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, they will activate when a player touches them, and will generate without <linked>Pressure Plates</linked> or <linked>wires</linked>. However, they can still be triggered by wires.
On the <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader version</linked>, they can only be triggered by wires, and will generate with Pressure Plates wired to them.
They consume no <linked>ammunition</linked>, and their output is limited only by a cooldown period of 3.33 seconds. Geyser streams extend approximately 20 tiles up or down, depending on placement.
Geysers can be placed on the top or bottom of <linked>blocks</linked>, facing upward or downward respectively, but not sideways.
